awards.text: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 28 wins & 25 nominations.

fullplot: Larry Flynt is the hedonistically obnoxious, but indomitable, publisher of Hustler magazine. The film recounts his struggle to make an honest living publishing his porn magazine and how it changes into a battle to protect the freedom of speech for all people.
plot: A partially idealized film of the controversial pornography publisher and how he became a defender of free speech for all people.
title: The People vs. Larry Flynt
